publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3920# Linda Fabiani: Avondale Schools and Fairtrade—That the Parliament congratulates St Patrick’s Primary School in Strathaven for becoming the third primary school in Avondale, along with Sandford Primary School and Chapelton Primary School, to achieve fair trade status with recognition and award from the Fairtrade Foundation; notes that Avondale’s further four primary schools and Strathaven Academy are also working towards fair trade status, and congratulates the Strathaven Fairtrade Group on the commitment and dedication it has shown both prior to and since Strathaven became the first Fairtrade Town in Scotland. R
S2M-3920# Avondale Schools and Fairtrade (lodged on 3 February 2006) Michael Matheson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3920# Avondale Schools and Fairtrade (lodged on 3 February 2006) John Swinburne*

S2M-3920# Avondale Schools and Fairtrade (lodged on 3 February 2006) Jim Mather*, Robin Harper*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Patrick Harvie*, Rosie Kane*, Christine Grahame*, Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*, Mr John Swinney*, Brian Adam*, Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3920# Avondale Schools and Fairtrade (lodged on 3 February 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3920# Avondale Schools and Fairtrade (lodged on 3 February 2006) Susan Deacon*
S2M-3920# Avondale Schools and Fairtrade (lodged on 3 February 2006) Mark Ballard*
